gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.rules.parser
Class FieldCheck

java.lang.Object
  gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.rules.parser.FieldCheck

public class FieldCheck
extends java.lang.Object

This specifies the check to perform over a field of an Event class.

Field Summary
 boolean exact
          flag that indicates whether the field value should be the one specified here, or match it as a regular expression.
 CheckedField field
          the field name.
 FieldCheck inner
          inner field to check.
 java.util.regex.Pattern pattern
          when the value is regular expression, this contains it (compiled).
 java.lang.String value
          the field value to check against (can be a regular expression), Exactly one of this and value is null
